MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL24 and LL25 postcode area of Betws-Y-Coed and Dolwyddelan, affecting properties in the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and fault location work and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.29AM on 25th October 2020.
